tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: From my baby born to till now we only visited Nilesh sir  and he is such a great doctor.His smiling face in-depth study of the details regarding issues and the explanation is just spectacular.Not only he will explain the health issues you informed about your baby but he will do a routine checkup from his side and explain everything which is wonderful.Doctors are the 2nd god that‚Äôs what he proved many time.Thank you so much sir for being there with us always üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We waited for 45 mins to see Dr Nilesh for my sons cough, cold, weight gain & allergy problems. We were called in and he examined the childs cough and asked questions on symptoms. After that, when we were about to tell him the next problem the child was facing when he interupted and called the next patient. But I insisted that my child has some rash. So, he suddenly got impatient and rudely replied that we should have told this before. He did not even examine my child and turned the other way without acknowledging.

Most of the time, he will only talk and not let patient describe the complaints. Infact in name of friendliness, ** **** * *** ********* ** * *** ******* ********* **** ***** * ***** *** **** *** ** * ***** ******** *** ********* ****** ****** ******* *** ******** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nilesh is very rude and always in hurry , doesn't listen to our concerns. He was in hurry to move on to next patient. We travelled 1hr, waited 1hr, paid 850, appointment  finished in 2 mins.  He doesn't spare 2 mins more listening to your concerns. We took our 6year old for cold and cough, after that we wanted to discuss about other concerns we had related to some skin allergies. Doctor got irritated and told you should explain everything one shot, I can't spare time checking him again and again. I have other patients to see. Later he checked and said it is nothing we are done. My son was still sitting on the bed he said get him down, take your file and leave. ******** ********* I wouldn't recommend him to anyone. I had a huge respect for cloudnine and the way they handle kids. We were in shock to see how unfriendly this doctor was. To add on that doctor gave a candy to sick kid and outside in the waiting they are distributing complimentary canned juices. * *** ******* ** *** ******** ************************ **** ******* my 6 year old is saying Doctor only gave chocolate, hospital only distributing packaged juice. ***** ***** ** ** ******** *** ***** *** ***** ** ** ********* **** ******* ****** ******* ** ****** ******* ******* ****** *** ****** ****** ** *** ********* We still hold Hospitals and Doctors with high regard, kids believe whatever you say is true please educate children about healthy eating* ****** **** ************ **** *****

My frist time experience is bad, he doesn't listen and speaks a lot. Doesn't close his door while talking to us.  So I can't understand more than half of what he is saying.  He looks like he is in lot of hurry.. if a doctor doesn't have time better not to give appointment.. As a first time parent we have lot of concerns but he doesn't  seems to care much as he is busy in typing and speaking.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** *** ** *** **** ************ **** * **** **** ******* He carefully examined my child during vaccination and plotted the values on growth chart and explained about my child's development. Explained thoroughly about complementary feeding as well. He welcomes everyone with a smile and is very friendly.

- Very friendly nature and enjoys treating the kids
- Punctual in attending the appointments
- Suggests minimal and needed medicine
